content:
GenerateManifestBase Class

In this Article

Represents the base class for all manifest generation tasks.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class GenerateManifestBase : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task
  • GenerateManifestBase

Inherited Members

BuildEngine
,
BuildEngine2
,
BuildEngine3
,
BuildEngine4
,
HelpKeywordPrefix
,
HostObject
,
Log
,
TaskResources
,
Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Constructors summary

GenerateManifestBase()

Initializes a new instance of the GenerateManifestBase class.

Properties summary

AssemblyName

Gets or sets the name of the assembly.
AssemblyVersion

Gets or sets the assembly version.
Description

Gets or sets the manifest description text.
EntryPoint

Gets or sets the managed assembly or ClickOnce manifest reference that is the entry point to the manifest.
InputManifest

Gets or sets the input manifest.
MaxTargetPath

Gets or sets the maximum manifest file name length.
OutputManifest

Gets or sets the generated manifest.
Platform

Gets or sets the manifest platform.
TargetCulture

Gets or sets the manifest target culture code.
TargetFrameworkMoniker

Gets or sets the target framework moniker.
TargetFrameworkVersion

The target .NET Framework version for the project.

Methods summary

AddAssemblyFromItem(ITaskItem)

Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.
AddAssemblyNameFromItem(ITaskItem,AssemblyReferenceType)

Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.
AddEntryPointFromItem(ITaskItem,AssemblyReferenceType)

Adds an entry point reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.
AddFileFromItem(ITaskItem)

Adds a file reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.
Execute()

Executes the GenerateManifestBase task.
FindFileFromItem(ITaskItem)

Returns the manifest file reference that matches the specified item.
GetObjectType()

When implemented in a derived class, returns the type of the manifest.
OnManifestLoaded(Manifest)

When implemented in a derived class, sets manifest properties and any dependencies.
OnManifestResolved(Manifest)

When implemented in a derived class, sets resolved manifest properties.
ValidateInputs()

Validates the inputs of the GenerateManifestBase task.
ValidateOutput()

Validates the generated manifest.

Constructors

  • GenerateManifestBase()

    Initializes a new instance of the GenerateManifestBase class.

    protected GenerateManifestBase ();

Properties

  • AssemblyName

    Gets or sets the name of the assembly.

    public string AssemblyName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the assembly.

  • AssemblyVersion

    Gets or sets the assembly version.

    public string AssemblyVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The assembly version.

  • Description

    Gets or sets the manifest description text.

    public string Description { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The manifest description text.

  • EntryPoint

    Gets or sets the managed assembly or ClickOnce manifest reference that is the entry point to the manifest.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem EntryPoint { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem

      The managed assembly or ClickOnce manifest reference that is the entry point to the application.

  • InputManifest

    Gets or sets the input manifest.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem InputManifest { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem

      The input manifest.

  • MaxTargetPath

    Gets or sets the maximum manifest file name length.

    public int MaxTargetPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The maximum manifest file name length.

  • OutputManifest

    Gets or sets the generated manifest.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem OutputManifest { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem

      The generated manifest.

  • Platform

    Gets or sets the manifest platform.

    public string Platform { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The manifest platform.

    Remarks

    The manifest platform can have one of the following values: x86, x64, Itanium, or AnyCPU.

  • TargetCulture

    Gets or sets the manifest target culture code.

    public string TargetCulture { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The manifest target culture code.

    Remarks

    Valid values for the target culture are any valid values for CultureInfo, and also "neutral" or "*" for neutral cultures.

  • TargetFrameworkMoniker

    Gets or sets the target framework moniker.

    public string TargetFrameworkMoniker { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the target framework moniker.

  • TargetFrameworkVersion

    The target .NET Framework version for the project.

    public string TargetFrameworkVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the .NET Framework version.

    Remarks

    The default value is empty, which means there is no filtering for the references based on the target framework.

Methods

  • AddAssemblyFromItem(ITaskItem)

    Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.

    protected Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference AddAssemblyFromItem (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem item);

    Parameters

    • item
      ITaskItem

      The item from which to create an assembly reference to add to the manifest.

    Returns

    • AssemblyReference

      The assembly reference that was added to the manifest.

  • AddAssemblyNameFromItem(ITaskItem,AssemblyReferenceType)

    Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.

    protected Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference AddAssemblyNameFromItem (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem item, Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReferenceType referenceType);

    Parameters

    • item
      ITaskItem

      The item from which to create an assembly reference to add to the manifest.

    • referenceType
      AssemblyReferenceType

      The assembly reference type.

    Returns

    • AssemblyReference

      The assembly reference that was added to the manifest.

  • AddEntryPointFromItem(ITaskItem,AssemblyReferenceType)

    Adds an entry point reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.

    protected Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference AddEntryPointFromItem (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem item, Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReferenceType referenceType);

    Parameters

    • item
      ITaskItem

      The item from which to create the entry point reference to add to the manifest.

    • referenceType
      AssemblyReferenceType

      The entry point assembly reference type.

    Returns

    • AssemblyReference

      The entry point reference that was added to the manifest.

  • AddFileFromItem(ITaskItem)

    Adds a file reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.

    protected Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference AddFileFromItem (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem item);

    Parameters

    • item
      ITaskItem

      The item from which to create the file reference to add to the manifest.

    Returns

    • FileReference

      The file reference that was added to the manifest.

  • Execute()

    Executes the GenerateManifestBase task.

    public override bool Execute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.

  • FindFileFromItem(ITaskItem)

    Returns the manifest file reference that matches the specified item.

    protected Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference FindFileFromItem (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem item);

    Parameters

    • item
      ITaskItem

      The item to get a file reference for.

    Returns

    • FileReference

      The manifest file reference that matches the specified item.

    Remarks

    If the file reference does not exist in the manifest for the specified item, then this method adds a file reference for this item.

  • GetObjectType()

    When implemented in a derived class, returns the type of the manifest.

    protected abstract Type GetObjectType ();

    Returns

    • Type

      The manifest type.

  • OnManifestLoaded(Manifest)

    When implemented in a derived class, sets manifest properties and any dependencies.

    protected abstract bool OnManifestLoaded (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest manifest);

    Parameters

    • manifest
      Manifest

      The manifest to set properties for.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if no errors occurred when the manifest properties are set; otherwise, false.

  • OnManifestResolved(Manifest)

    When implemented in a derived class, sets resolved manifest properties.

    protected abstract bool OnManifestResolved (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest manifest);

    Parameters

    • manifest
      Manifest

      The manifest to set properties for.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if no errors occurred when the manifest properties are set; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    For example, resolved manifest properties are the publisher and product.

  • ValidateInputs()

    Validates the inputs of the GenerateManifestBase task.

    protected virtual bool ValidateInputs ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if input validation succeeded; otherwise, false.

  • ValidateOutput()

    Validates the generated manifest.

    protected virtual bool ValidateOutput ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if manifest validation succeeded; otherwise, false.
